item.title: Wonder
item.description: Book: Wonder # The Book ‘Wonder’ is a book which is quite realistic. August ‘Auggie’ Pullman, a ten-year-old kid, was born with a gene defect, which makes his face look ‘deformed’, as Julian describes it. Auggie was homeschooled until he was in 5th grade, and finally got to a real school. Wonder is told from different perspectives, as for Summer’s (Auggies friend (NOT girlfriend)), Jack’s (Auggies friend) and Via’s (Auggies sister) perspective.
